name: Sarah Scott
title: Like a movie star
header: Isn’t this the one day you should feel
subtitle: in every way?
text: RED Weddings is a premium wedding cinematography, photography, music and entertainment service firm for today’s most discerning brides and grooms. We transform your day into a piece of history by continuously challenging and setting new standards for wedding cinematography,photography, music, and entertainment production
